synonyms: sakhya-bhāva—by fraternal love; ākrānta—overwhelmed; citta—heart; gopa-avatāra—an incarnation of one of the cowherd boys; svarūpa-gosāñi-saha—with Svarūpa Dāmodara; sakhya-vyavahāra—dealings just like those of a friend.
translation: He was fully absorbed in thoughts of fraternal relationships with God. He was an incarnation of a cowherd boy, and thus his dealings with Svarūpa Dāmodara Gosvāmī were very friendly.
